title: Butter Chicken
shortDescription: A popular Indian dish made with tender chicken pieces in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
ingredients: Chicken, tomato, onion, garlic, ginger, butter, cream, spices, salt, oil
stepsToPrepare: 1. Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt. 2. Grill or bake the chicken. 3. In a pan, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. 4. Add tomato and cook until soft. 5. Add chicken and spices, stir well. 6. Add cream and simmer for a few minutes. 7. Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Chana Masala
shortDescription: A spicy and flavorful chickpea dish, popular in North India.
ingredients: Chickpeas, onion, garlic, ginger, tomato, spices, salt, oil
stepsToPrepare: 1. Cook chickpeas until soft. 2. In a pan, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. 3. Add tomato and cook until soft. 4. Add chickpeas and spices, stir well. 5. Cook for a few minutes. 6. Serve hot with rice or roti.

title: Palak Paneer
shortDescription: A creamy spinach dish with paneer (Indian cottage cheese), popular in North India.
ingredients: Spinach, paneer, onion, garlic, ginger, tomato, spices, salt, oil
stepsToPrepare: 1. Cook spinach until soft. 2. In a pan, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. 3. Add tomato and cook until soft. 4. Add paneer and spices, stir well. 5. Cook for a few minutes. 6. Serve hot with rice or roti.

title: Aloo Gobi
shortDescription: A popular vegetarian dish from Punjab, made with potatoes and cauliflower.
ingredients: Potatoes, cauliflower, onion, garlic, ginger, tomato, spices, salt, oil
stepsToPrepare: 1. Cut potatoes and cauliflower into small pieces. 2. In a pan, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. 3. Add tomato and cook until soft. 4. Add potatoes and cauliflower, stir well. 5. Add spices and salt, mix well. 6. Cook until potatoes and cauliflower are tender. 7. Serve hot with rice or roti.

title: Matar Paneer
shortDescription: A vegetarian dish made with peas and paneer (Indian cottage cheese), popular in North India.
ingredients: Peas, paneer, onion, garlic, ginger, tomato, spices, salt, oil
stepsToPrepare: 1. Cook peas until soft. 2. In a pan, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. 3. Add tomato and cook until soft. 4. Add paneer and spices, stir well. 5. Cook for a few minutes. 6. Serve hot with rice or roti.

title: Rajma Chawal
shortDescription: A popular dish from Punjab, made with kidney beans and rice.
ingredients: Kidney beans, rice, onion, garlic, ginger, tomato, spices, salt, oil
stepsToPrepare: 1. Cook kidney beans until soft. 2. Cook rice according to package instructions. 3. In a pan, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. 4. Add tomato and cook until soft. 5. Add kidney beans and spices, stir well. 6. Cook for a few minutes. 7. Serve hot with rice.

title: Chole Bhature
shortDescription: A popular street food from Punjab, made with chickpeas and fried bread.
ingredients: Chickpeas, flour, onion, garlic, ginger, tomato, spices, salt, oil
stepsToPrepare: 1. Cook chickpeas until soft. 2. Prepare the bhature dough. 3. Fry the bhature. 4. In a pan, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. 5. Add tomato and cook until soft. 6. Add chickpeas and spices, stir well. 7. Serve hot with bhature.

title: Paneer Tikka
shortDescription: A popular starter made with paneer marinated in spices and grilled.
ingredients: Paneer, yogurt, onion, garlic, ginger, spices, salt, oil
stepsToPrepare: 1. Marinate paneer with yogurt and spices. 2. Grill or broil the paneer. 3. Serve hot with chutney.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
shortDescription: A popular Indian dish made with marinated chicken pieces cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
ingredients: Chicken, yogurt, garam masala, paprika, cumin, coriander, turmeric, garlic, ginger, onion, tomato, cream
stepsToPrepare: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt, spices, and lemon juice. 2. Grill or broil the marinated chicken. 3. Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. 4. Add tomato, spices, and chicken stock, simmer until thickened. 5. Stir in cream and serve over rice.

title: Biryani
shortDescription: A flavorful Indian dish made with rice, meat, and a variety of spices.
ingredients: Basmati rice, chicken, onion, garlic, ginger, tomato, garam masala, paprika, cumin, coriander, turmeric, saffron, yogurt
stepsToPrepare: 1. Cook rice and set aside. 2. Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. 3. Add tomato, spices, and chicken, cook until tender. 4. Mix rice, chicken, and saffron-yogurt mixture, bake until heated through.

title: Tandoori Chicken
shortDescription: A popular Indian dish made with marinated chicken pieces cooked in a tandoor (clay oven).
ingredients: Chicken, yogurt, garam masala, paprika, cumin, coriander, turmeric, garlic, ginger, lemon juice
stepsToPrepare: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt, spices, and lemon juice. 2. Grill or broil the marinated chicken in a tandoor. 3. Serve with raita or flatbread.
